text: W. J. Hamilton may refer to: * Wendy J. Hamilton, American anti-drink drive campaigner * William John Hamilton (1805–1867), English geologist * William J. Hamilton, (born 1932), American Democratic Party politician from New Jersey * W. J. W. Hamilton (1825–1883), New Zealand public servant and part-owner of the Lyttelton Times ==See also== *Hamilton (surname)
title: W. J. Hamilton
